about_the_game:
FIDELIS is a corporate “city of the future”, built on the ideas of collecting and analyzing all of the possible data about its residents. This allowed the city's systems to adapt to the needs of its citizens, providing them with the most comfortable lifestyle. At least this was the case before the global failure in the city’s systems, which resulted in a large-scale leak of personal data and general information about its residents. Suddenly, it turned out that the system stored much more information than it used. The leak also contained people's personal secrets, which instantly became known to everyone. This angered many and one day the entire prosperous technological city became a field of riots.


Corporations left the city, and residents, traumatized by the incident, began to flock into groups united by a common attitude towards the leak and its consequences, in an attempt to establish a new life. A new government is also beginning to form in the city, which is trying to take control of the situation and establish normal life in the city.


The city government creates a special police squad to investigate cases related to the leak and the groups of residents formed as a result of it.

About gameplay
  • You will become an operator of the special police department of the city FIDELIS. The operator guides the agent’s actions at the crime scene and conducts the investigation itself remotely.
  • Manage the actions of an operative: search and analyze evidence, interrogate characters, find hidden paths at crime scenes.
  • Work with the database: sort and filter the information found by the operative, identify facts that may be useful in the investigation.
  • Investigate and accuse: The detective system helps you structure your investigation, but does not draw conclusions instead of you.
  • Identify the criminal: compare evidence and bring charges if you are sure you are right

short_description: The ideal corporate city has fallen after a global data breach. The terrible secrets of its citizens became known to everyone. Lives were ruined. You must return peace to this city: make the criminals answer for their actions and, perhaps, find out the cause of the global failure.
supported_languages: Russian, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Polish
